title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2397.6 - Liability for transaction costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2397.6 - Liability for transaction costs

State Regulations
(a) ACH debit, ACH credit and fedwire. The
taxpayer shall be liable for the transaction costs associated with ACH debit, ACH credit or fedwire transactions. (b) Certified check. The taxpayer shall be
liable for both the charges imposed by its financial institution for certified
checks, if any, and for the costs of mailing its transmittal form and
payment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2397.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
